title: Does Apple Music sync with iTunes? - Quora

response.answer_text: If you subscribe to Apple Music, you can turn on Sync Library to access your music library and music that you've downloaded from Apple Music on all of your devices. If you have an Apple ID, just open iTunes on your computer and log into your Apple ID, and then you can sync Apple Music with iTunes. Take the Mac for the example. On your Mac Open the Music app.From the menu bar at the top of your screen, choose Music > Preferences.Go to the General tab and select Sync Library to turn it on. If you don't subscribe to Apple Music or iTunes Match, you won’t see an option to turn on Sync Library.Click OK. If you have a large music library, it might take some time to upload and sync your music library across all of your devices.
